snippet: Even though he played all but the last six weeks in the National League, Yankees third baseman Chase Headley has managed to record at least one hit in all 30 current major league stadiums.
abstract: New York Yankees third baseman Chase Headley has managed to get a hit in all 30 current MLB stadiums, rare feat for someone who had only played in National League until his mid-season trade to the Yankees.
lead_paragraph: Even though he played all but the last six weeks in the National League, Yankees third baseman Chase Headley has managed to record at least one hit in all 30 current major league stadiums.

headline.main: Batting 1.000: Headley Has a Hit in Every Park
headline.print_headline: Batting 1.000: Headley Has a Hit in Every Park
